com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.services

Class JpaCommandServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.core.jpa.services.JpaCommandServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandService

    @Transactional(rollbackFor={GenieException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class})
public class JpaCommandServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandService
    Implementation of the CommandService interface.
    Since:
    2.0.0

        Specified by:
        getCommands in interface CommandService
        Parameters:
        name - Name of command config
        user - The name of the user who created the configuration
        statuses - The status of the applications to get. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this command

        Returns:
        All the commands matching the specified criteria
